DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Sends an NBC report for the specified nuclear, biological, or chemical contamination area. Note that NBC reports are automatically sent when NBC areas are detected by units with NBC sensors. This task can be used to send these reports at other times.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>nbcArea</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>NBC Area:</myLabel> <myToolTip>Select the NBC area to report on</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtAllContaminationAreas</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>engagementResult</myVariableName> <myType>string</myType> <myLabel>Engagement Result: </myLabel> <myToolTip>Free form string that can be result of this spot report</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
